body_html: Great to know this is being worked on! I think having the raw tracing data retrievable is higher priority than nice visualization -- if I had some way to see send/recv timing in the .pbtxt file I could diagnose things already . BTW, I don't see post-partitioning GraphDefs in RunMetadata when running with tf.RunOptions.FULL_TRACE, is there some extra option to turn that on?

body: Great to know this is being worked on! I think having the raw tracing data retrievable is higher priority than nice visualization -- if I had some way to see send/recv timing in the .pbtxt file I could diagnose things already . BTW, I don't see post-partitioning GraphDefs in RunMetadata when running with `tf.RunOptions.FULL_TRACE`, is there some extra option to turn that on?
